import { Avatar, Input, ListItem, } from '@material-ui/core'; import React, { useContext,useState } from 'react' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, CardHeader, Col, Container, Row, } from 'reactstrap'; import { userContext } from './../context/context' import { FcSearch } from 'react-icons/fc' import { IoMdPersonAdd,} from 'react-icons/io' import {ImCross} from 'react-icons/im' import Message from '../Component/Message'; import Addcon from '../Component/Addcon'; import {io} from 'socket.io-client' export default function Home() { const socket = io('http://localhost:5000/'); socket.on('connect',(socket)=>{ console.log('Connected to server'); }) socket.on('disconnect',(socket)=>{ console.log('Socket connection disconnected'); }) const [search,setSearch] = useState(false); const [addCon,setAddCon] = useState(false); const context = useContext(userContext); console.log(context) return (
{context.token ? ( <>
{context.user.user?.name}
{search ? (
setSearch(false)}/>
) : ( <>
Connections
setSearch(true)}/>
setAddCon(true)} />
)}
Elone Musk
Flex item
{addCon ? ( ) : ( )}
) : ( )}
) }
